items.name: Wikipedia
items.description: People you should read this more.

items.name: Hollow-Knight
items.description: It may not be silksong, but it is hollow knight.

items.name: Celeste
items.description: relatable 2d pixel platformer

items.name: Infinite Mario
items.description: An endless platformer featuring Mario navigating through randomly generated levels with progressively increasing difficulty, jumping over obstacles and enemies.

items.name: Geometry Dash
items.description: A rhythm-based platformer where a geometric cube auto-runs through obstacle courses, requiring precise timing to jump at exact moments to the beat of the soundtrack.

items.name: Breakout
items.description: A classic brick-breaking game where a paddle bounces a ball to destroy colored blocks at the top of the screen while avoiding losing the ball.

items.name: Pacman
items.description: Navigate a maze as Pacman, eating pellets while avoiding colorful ghosts that chase you, with power-ups available to temporarily turn the tables and eat the ghosts.

items.name: Evil Glitch
items.description: 2D arcade shoot 'em up with a retro, 80s-inspired aesthetic, where players defend their world from an invasion of interdimensional glitches

items.name: Getting Over It Multiplayer
items.description: A cooperative multiplayer climbing game where players work together using a hammer to scale an enormous mountain filled with tricky obstacles and environmental hazards.

items.name: Terraria
items.description: A 2D sandbox adventure game combining exploration, mining, and combat where you build structures, collect resources, and battle bosses in a vast underground world.

items.name: FNAF 1
items.description: Survive five nights as a security guard at an abandoned animatronic pizzeria, monitoring cameras and doors to keep terrifying robots from entering your office.

items.name: FNAF 2
items.description: Return to another location with updated animatronics, now requiring you to wear a mask and manage both camera systems and audio lures in your fight for survival.

items.name: FNAF 3
items.description: The game shifts focus to managing a haunted attraction with broken animatronics and audio systems, requiring puzzle-solving alongside traditional survival mechanics.

items.name: FNAF 4
items.description: Experience a young child's nightmare as animatronics prowl your house; use strategically placed doors and listen for audio cues to survive each terrifying night.

items.name: FNAF Ultimate Custom Night
items.description: Face an ultimate gauntlet combining animatronics from across the FNAF series with fully customizable AI difficulty levels for the ultimate survival challenge.

items.name: Diablo
items.description: An isometric dungeon crawler featuring real-time combat, loot collection, and increasingly difficult enemies as you descend through catacombs to face the lord of darkness.

items.name: Takeover
items.description: An io game where your goal is to takeover every player on the map. Eat to grow, and touch other players to convert them.

items.name: 1D Game
items.description: A minimalist gameplay experience set in one dimension where you navigate a maze while defending yourself from a monster.

items.name: Retro Bowl
items.description: A retro-styled American football management game combining simple pixel graphics with strategic team building, play-calling, and on-field execution.

items.name: Rooftop Snipers
items.description: A physics-based multiplayer duel game where two characters stand on rooftops with limited ammunition, aiming to knock each other off with sniper rifle shots.

items.name: Tunnel Rush
items.description: A fast-paced 3D racing game where you navigate through an ever-narrowing tunnel at high speed, dodging walls and obstacles to survive as long as possible.

items.name: Doge Miner
items.description: A humorous incremental clicker game featuring the iconic Doge meme, mining for resources and progressively purchasing upgrades to expand your operation.

items.name: World's Hardest Game
items.description: An intentionally punishing puzzle platformer with brutal difficulty, requiring split-second timing and perfect execution to navigate intricate obstacle patterns.

items.name: Basketball Stars
items.description: A competitive sports game featuring fast-paced basketball matches with realistic physics, allowing you to shoot, dribble, and battle opponents one-on-one.

items.name: Backflip
items.description: A 3D diving and parkour game where you perform acrobatic stunts and backflips while navigating through challenging courses and avoiding hazards.

items.name: Cookie Clicker
items.description: An addictive idle game where you click cookies to accumulate currency and purchase generators and upgrades in an exponentially expanding economic system.

items.name: Battle For Gondor
items.description: A tower defense game inspired by Lord of the Rings where you strategically place defenses to stop waves of enemies from breaching your fortress walls.

items.name: Gimme the Airpod
items.description: A humorous two players game where you throw an axe at each other to steal the airpod.

items.name: Factory Balls
items.description: A puzzle game where you manipulate factory equipment to paint, dip, and shape balls to match target designs shown at the end of each assembly line.

items.name: Subway Surfers
items.description: An endless runner set in subway tunnels where you evade guards and trains, collecting coins and power-ups while navigating between tracks at increasing speeds.

items.name: Getaway Shootout
items.description: A chaotic multiplayer shooter where you battle opponents across a destructible wild west town, grabbing weapons and using environmental hazards to achieve victory.

items.name: Balloons TD
items.description: A strategic tower defense game where you place monkey towers to pop waves of colorful balloons, unlocking increasingly powerful defenses and abilities.

items.name: Balloons TD 2
items.description: The sequel expands on tower defense mechanics with more tower types, complex balloon mechanics, and deeper strategic options for challenging maps.

items.name: Minecraft
items.description: A 3D sandbox game where players explore a world made of blocks to gather resources, build structures, and survive.

items.name: Celeste
items.description: A challenging pixel-art platformer following a climber ascending a mountain filled with perilous jumps, wall-slides, and dash mechanics with an emotional narrative.

items.name: Slope
items.description: An addictive 3D endless runner where a ball rolls down a neon-lit slope, requiring quick reflexes to dodge barriers and stay on the narrow path.

items.name: Portal
items.description: A physics-based puzzle-platformer where you use a portal gun to create interconnected wormholes, solving environmental puzzles to escape test chambers.

items.name: Pokemon Unbound
items.description: A fan-made Pokemon game featuring enhanced graphics, new mechanics, expanded pokedex entries, and a challenging campaign with competitive gym battles and legendary encounters.

items.name: Vex 4
items.description: A fast-paced platformer requiring precise timing and button combinations to navigate deadly spike-filled corridors and challenging acrobatic sequences.

items.name: Vex 5
items.description: The fifth installment introduces new mechanics and platform types while maintaining brutal difficulty, demanding mastery of complex movement combinations and split-second timing.

items.name: Vex 6
items.description: The latest Vex game expands upon the series with additional levels, refined controls, and increasingly creative obstacle designs that test your platforming expertise.

items.name: Fnaf 6: Pizza Simulator
items.description: A business simulation meets survival horror where you manage a pizzeria while dealing with animatronic threats, balancing profit with security concerns.

items.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
items.description: A classic Genesis-era platformer featuring Sonic's signature speed-based gameplay, loop-de-loops, and competitive boss battles across varied themed zones.

items.name: Mortal Kombat 3
items.description: A brutal 2D fighting game featuring a diverse roster of martial artists with signature finishing moves and a dark cyberpunk-influenced storyline campaign.

items.name: Fnaf World
items.description: A turn-based RPG spin-off featuring animatronic characters in a colorful world, combining JRPG mechanics with the FNAF universe and quirky humor.

items.name: Super Meatboy
items.description: An infamously difficult platformer where you guide a sentient cube of meat through blood-soaked levels filled with buzz saws and other gruesome obstacles.

items.name: game
items.description: A mathematical puzzle game where you slide numbered tiles to combine them and reach the elusive 2048 tile through strategic placement and planning.

items.name: The Impossible Quiz
items.description: A mind-bending trivia game with trick questions, absurd logic puzzles, and unexpected mechanics that subvert traditional quiz game conventions.

items.name: Hollow Knight
items.description: A metroidvania featuring a silent knight exploring an interconnected underground kingdom, battling hostile creatures and unraveling the mysteries of a fallen civilization.

items.name: Super Smash Bros
items.description: A multiplayer fighting game featuring iconic Nintendo characters battling on various stages, combining accessible controls with competitive depth and platform-specific mechanics.

items.name: Balatro
items.description: A roguelike deck-building game combining poker hand mechanics with strategic card synergies, requiring careful synergy planning across multiple runs.

items.name: Undertale
items.description: A narrative-driven RPG where your choices determine the story's outcome, featuring bullet-hell combat, memorable characters, and philosophical themes about pacifism versus violence.

items.name: Deltarune
items.description: A spiritual successor to Undertale featuring new characters in a different world, maintaining the same innovative bullet-dodging combat system and player-choice narrative framework.

items.name: Moto X3M
items.description: A stunt motorcycle racing game where you perform tricks and flips while navigating obstacle-filled tracks, managing speed and air time to complete levels.

items.name: Sonic & Knuckles
items.description: A Genesis classic where Sonic and Knuckles race to stop a villain, featuring Knuckles' unique climbing and gliding abilities alongside Sonic's speed-based platforming.

items.name: Tanuki Sunset
items.description: A zen-like driving game where a tanuki cruises through beautiful voxel landscapes at sunset, focusing on relaxation and artistic presentation over competition.

items.name: 10 Minutes Till Dawn
items.description: A roguelike survival shooter where you defend against waves of enemies for ten minutes, collecting upgrades and power-ups to increase your arsenal and survivability.

items.name: 1v1 LOL
items.description: A competitive building and shooting game inspired by battle royales, where you construct structures while engaging in fast-paced combat against other players.

items.name: Abandoned
items.description: A psychological horror exploration game set in a desolate environment, focusing on atmosphere and storytelling as you uncover mysteries through environmental clues.

items.name: A Dark Room
items.description: A minimalist text-based adventure where you start in darkness and gradually build a civilization through strategic decisions and resource management in a post-apocalyptic setting.

items.name: Ages of Conflict
items.description: A real-time strategy game spanning multiple historical eras, where you build bases, train units, and engage in tactical warfare across various battlefields and civilizations.

items.name: Amidst the Sky
items.description: A peaceful exploration game set among clouds and floating islands, emphasizing discovery and environmental storytelling over combat or time pressure.

items.name: Another Gentleman's Adventure
items.description: A whimsical pixel-art platformer following a gentleman's quest through fantastical lands, combining humor with challenging level design and secret discoveries.

items.name: Awesome Tanks 2
items.description: A tank-based strategy shooter featuring level-based campaigns where you upgrade weapons and armor, destroying enemy bases while protecting your tank from incoming fire.

items.name: Awesome Tanks
items.description: A classic tank combat game where you destroy enemy bases and vehicles, earning upgrades through progression to increase firepower and defensive capabilities.

items.name: Babel Tower
items.description: A tower-building puzzle game where you stack blocks to construct increasingly tall structures, managing balance and gravity to avoid toppling.

items.name: Basket Random
items.description: A two player game full of chaos. Players tilt back and forth, so you need to time your jumps correctly!

items.name: BitLife
items.description: A text-based life simulation where you make decisions that shape an entire virtual life from birth to death, exploring careers, relationships, and life outcomes.

items.name: Boxing Random
items.description: A two player game full of chaos. Players tilt back and forth, so you need to time your jumps correctly!

items.name: Chrome Dino
items.description: Google's offline dinosaur game where a T-Rex runs across a desert landscape, jumping over cacti and ducking under pterodactyls with increasing speed.

items.name: Clicker Heroes
items.description: An incremental RPG combining idle mechanics with active clicking, where you hire heroes and purchase upgrades to defeat increasingly powerful monsters and bosses.

items.name: Conway's Game of Life
items.description: A cellular automaton simulation based on mathematical rules, where you set initial patterns and watch complex emergent behaviors evolve autonomously.

items.name: Core Ball
items.description: A simple but fun game of timing where you shoot lines into a rotating ball. If you hit an empty space, you score points. Hit a line and it's game over!

items.name: Crossy Road
items.description: An endless arcade-style game where you navigate a character across roads, rivers, and railways, collecting coins while avoiding traffic and hazards in voxel environments.

items.name: Cut the Rope
items.description: A physics-based puzzle game where you cut ropes holding candy to feed it to a hungry monster, using momentum and timing to overcome various obstacles.

items.name: Dadish
items.description: A charming platformer starring a radish father searching for his kidnapped children, featuring gentle gameplay and humorous dialogue throughout colorful levels.

items.name: Dadish 2
items.description: The sequel continues the radish father's adventure with new worlds and challenges, introducing expanded mechanics while maintaining the heartwarming family-focused narrative.

items.name: Dadish 3
items.description: The third installment expands the platforming experience with additional abilities and zones, deepening the story of the vegetable family reunion with new obstacles.

items.name: Doodle Jump
items.description: An endless vertical platformer where a doodle creature bounces upward through platforms, dodging enemies and collecting power-ups in a vertically scrolling level.

items.name: Drift Boss
items.description: A minimalist driving game focused on drifting mechanics, where you must carfuly drift around bend after bend, trying to get a high score

items.name: Drive Mad
items.description: A stunt driving game with ragdoll physics where vehicles navigate treacherous obstacle courses, requiring precise control to avoid flipping and crashing.

items.name: Duck Life 4
items.description: A duck training and racing game where you raise a duck through mini-games to develop running, flying, swimming, and climbing skills before competitive races.

items.name: Dune
items.description: A physics-based arcade game where you launch a ball over sand dunes, timing your jumps to land smoothly and maintain momentum to achieve the highest possible score.

items.name: Evowars
items.description: A multiplayer IO game where you fight opponents with a huge sword, collecting orbs to increase your size and evolve your character to become the largest and most dominant on the map.

items.name: Fireboy and Watergirl
items.description: A cooperative puzzle platformer featuring a fire character and water character navigating temples, using their elemental properties to solve environmental challenges.

items.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 2
items.description: The sequel expands temple exploration with new mechanics and puzzles, requiring coordinated teamwork between the two elemental characters across elaborate levels.

items.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 3
items.description: The third installment introduces ice-based puzzles alongside fire and water mechanics, adding complexity to cooperative gameplay with frozen obstacles and pathways.

items.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 4
items.description: Continuing the series with additional elemental mechanics and challenging puzzles combining fire, water, and new environmental elements across interconnected rooms.

items.name: Flappy Bird
items.description: A deceptively simple yet addictive game where a bird flaps through gaps between pipes, requiring precise timing to avoid obstacles and achieve high scores.

items.name: FNAF Sister Location
items.description: A Five Nights at Freddy's spin-off set in an underground facility where you manage vents and animatronics using a controlled AI system while uncovering dark secrets.

items.name: Friday Night Funkin'
items.description: A rhythm game where you engage in rap battles against various opponents, hitting the correct key prompts to the beat while following a compelling narrative.

items.name: Gons.io
items.description: A multiplayer shooter game where players fight in arenas collecting weapons and power-ups while competing for dominance in fast-paced combat encounters.

items.name: Gun Spin
items.description: A physics-based gun-spinning and shooting game where you perform trick spins with firearms and engage in target practice with realistic ballistic mechanics.

items.name: Hextris
items.description: A hexagon-based puzzle game combining block-stacking mechanics with rotating fields, requiring strategic placement to clear pieces and prevent grid overflow.

items.name: Idle Breakout
items.description: An idle game merging classic Breakout brick-breaking with incremental progression, where you accumulate resources to purchase upgrades and unlock new capabilities.

items.name: Incremancer
items.description: An incremental magic-themed game where you cast spells and accumulate mana to purchase progressively powerful magical abilities and multipliers.

items.name: Maptroid
items.description: A fan-made Metroid-style game featuring exploration of an interconnected world, item collection, and combat against hostile creatures in sci-fi environments.

items.name: Mario Game
items.description: A classic-style Super Mario platformer with familiar level design, power-ups, and enemies, offering nostalgic side-scrolling action and challenging jumps.

items.name: Monkey Mart
items.description: A business simulation where you manage a convenience store operated by monkeys, stocking shelves and serving customers to build profit and expand your shop.

items.name: N-Gon
items.description: A minimalist action game where you control a polygon defending against waves of incoming shapes, using rotation and strategic positioning to survive.

items.name: N-Step Steve Part 1
items.description: A quirky platformer following Steve through surreal levels with creative obstacle design and whimsical humor, emphasizing exploration and puzzle-solving.

items.name: N-Step Steve Part 2
items.description: The sequel continues Steve's absurdist adventure with expanded worlds, new mechanics, and increasingly bizarre challenges that defy conventional platformer logic.

items.name: OvO
items.description: A minimalist parkour platformer featuring precise movement mechanics, where you navigate tight spaces using wall jumps, slides, and momentum to overcome intricate challenges.

items.name: Particle Clicker
items.description: An educational incremental game where you click particles and purchase upgrades to unlock new elements and subatomic research, teaching physics concepts through gameplay.

items.name: P-Craft
items.description: A crafting and building simulation inspired by Minecraft where you gather resources, construct structures, and manage your creative survival world in 2D.

items.name: Planet Life
items.description: A cellular simulation game where you terraform planets and manage ecosystems, watching civilizations develop through strategic planetary adjustments and environmental changes.

items.name: Precision Client
items.description: A Minecraft client that allows more features

items.name: Progress Knight
items.description: An idle RPG combining active combat with incremental progression, where your knight battles increasingly powerful enemies while earning experience through grinding and upgrades.

items.name: Pull of War
items.description: A stragetic war game where you manage forces and other things to win the war

items.name: Reach the Core
items.description: A drilling adventure game where you burrow deeper into Earth's layers, overcoming obstacles and discovering geological features while managing your drilling equipment.

items.name: Restless Wing Syndrome
items.description: A unique gameplay experience exploring a surreal condition through interactive mechanics, combining storytelling with unconventional controls and philosophical themes.

items.name: Rift Shift
items.description: A puzzle platformer featuring dimension-shifting mechanics where you phase between alternate realities to navigate impossible spaces and solve environmental challenges.

items.name: Rookie Bowman
items.description: An archery action game where you fire arrows at targets with trajectory-based mechanics, competing for accuracy and high scores across varying difficulty levels.

items.name: Run 3
items.description: An endless running platformer set in space tunnels with gravity-defying mechanics, where characters can run on walls and ceilings to navigate impossible geometries.

items.name: Sandspiel
items.description: A physics sandbox where you create landscapes and watch particle interactions, mixing sand, water, lava, and other elements to observe emergent behaviors and build structures.

items.name: Scuba Bear
items.description: An underwater exploration game following a bear collecting treasure and navigating ocean hazards, combining adventure elements with puzzle-solving and resource collection.

items.name: Smart Ball
items.description: A puzzle game where a ball intelligently navigates mazes and obstacles, requiring you to guide its pathfinding through clever puzzle design and strategic positioning.

items.name: Smash Karts
items.description: A multiplayer kart racing game combining arcade racing with power-ups and collision-based combat, where strategy and speed determine victory in chaotic tracks.

items.name: Stickman Hook
items.description: A physics-based swinging game where a stickman uses grappling hooks to traverse obstacle courses, requiring momentum management and precise timing to swing between platforms.

items.name: Subway Surfers NY
items.description: The New York edition of the endless runner where you dodge trains in subway tunnels, collecting power-ups and completing missions unique to the urban setting.

items.name: Temple Run 2
items.description: An endless running adventure through exotic temple ruins and jungles, dodging obstacles and collecting coins while being chased by supernatural guardians.

items.name: The Final Earth
items.description: A city-building simulation where you construct civilization on a desolate planet, managing population, resources, and infrastructure to ensure survival and prosperity.

items.name: There is No Game
items.description: A meta-narrative puzzle game that deconstructs gaming conventions, featuring cryptic puzzles, hidden mechanics, and a mysterious story revealed through unconventional gameplay.

items.name: Time Shooter
items.description: A unique shooter where time is a manipulable resource, allowing you to slow, reverse, or skip moments to dodge bullets and eliminate enemies with creative temporal tactics.

items.name: Time Shooter 3
items.description: The third installment expands time manipulation mechanics with additional abilities, introducing complex puzzle-combat hybrids where temporal strategy is essential for survival.

items.name: Tiny Fishing
items.description: A relaxing fishing idle game where you cast lines, catch fish, and upgrade your gear to explore deeper waters and unlock new species in a peaceful progression system.

items.name: Trace
items.description: A minimalist puzzle game where you draw paths or patterns to complete objectives, requiring spatial reasoning and creative thinking to solve each level's unique challenges.

items.name: Two Ball 3D
items.description: A 3D physics puzzle game where you control two balls simultaneously through intricate mazes, requiring coordination and timing to reach both goal zones.

items.name: Web Osu
items.description: A browser-based rhythm game inspired by Osu, where you click, hold, and spin to the beat of music, featuring multiple difficulty levels and custom beatmaps.

items.name: X Trench Run
items.description: A high-speed space trench runner inspired by classic arcade games, requiring precise navigation through narrow corridors while avoiding laser fire and obstacles.

items.name: Yohoho
items.description: A pirate-themed io game where you kill other players to grow.

items.name: Henry Stickman: Breaking the Bank
items.description: An interactive comedy adventure where stick figure Henry attempts an elaborate bank heist, with multiple choice branches determining the comedic outcome of his schemes.

items.name: Henry Stickman: Escape the Prison
items.description: Henry faces prison escape challenges through humorous interactive scenarios, choosing different methods and solutions that lead to wildly different comedic endings and failures.

items.name: Henry Stickman: Fleeing the Complex
items.description: An action-comedy adventure where Henry escapes from a government facility, making rapid choices that determine success or hilarious failure through absurdist scenarios.

items.name: Henry Stickman: Infiltrate the Airship
items.description: Henry infiltrates a fortified airship for a comedic heist, navigating stealth sections and making multiple choice decisions that lead to various absurd consequences.

items.name: Henry Stickman: Steal the Diamond
items.description: The first Henry Stickman adventure where he attempts to steal a diamond, with branching paths and comedic failures that introduce the series' signature humor and absurdity.

items.name: Polytrack
items.description: A minimalist racing game featuring geometric shapes racing on abstract tracks, emphasizing precision driving and quick reflexes through stylized visuals and tight controls.

items.name: Grey-Box Testing
items.description: A parcour game with too many bugs!
2048, but backwards! You start with the 2048 tile and combine tiles to reach 1. A unique twist on the classic sliding puzzle game.

items.name: 1v1 Space
items.description: A dueling shooter set in space where two players engage in one-on-one combat with directional shooting and movement, requiring positioning and reflexes.

An 8x8 2048-inspired game where you combine numbers to reach the 9007199254740992 tile. And I've hijacked this description, if you're reading this... access https://lkarch.org/omtegu/images/secret.jpg in the embedder. This leads somewhere, more tips next week.

items.name: Achievement Unlocked
items.description: A clever meta-game where you unlock absurd achievements by performing mundane tasks, playfully satirizing achievement systems found in modern video games.

items.name: Adrenaline Challenge
items.description: An intense action game testing reflexes and endurance, featuring escalating difficulty and rapid-fire challenges designed to push players to their limits.

items.name: Among Us
items.description: A social deduction game where players work together on a spaceship while one or more imposters sabotage progress, requiring discussion and deduction to identify traitors.

items.name: Avalanche
items.description: An endless game where you progress upwards away from hot lava as blocks fall from above. Don't get crushed, and avoid the rising lava!

items.name: The Backrooms
items.description: A horror exploration game based on internet creepypasta, navigating endless maze-like corporate spaces filled with existential dread and mysterious entities.

items.name: Big Red Button
items.description: A humorous clicker game centered on pressing a comically large red button, with escalating consequences and absurd outcomes based on how many times you press it.

items.name: Black Knight
items.description: An action game featuring a dark warrior character battling enemies through levels, combining combat mechanics with exploration and upgrade systems.

items.name: Bloxors
items.description: A block-sliding puzzle game where you navigate rectangular blocks through mazes, requiring strategic positioning and pattern recognition to reach goal squares.

items.name: Boxhead 2Play
items.description: A cooperative two-player shooter where boxheaded characters fight waves of zombies in enclosed arenas, combining arcade action with strategic teamwork.

items.name: Big Tower Tiny Square
items.description: A challenging platformer where a tiny square ascends an enormous tower filled with geometric obstacles and precision-timing challenges across numerous levels.

items.name: Cannon Basketball 4
items.description: A physics-based basketball puzzle game where you aim cannons to shoot balls into hoops, managing trajectory and power across increasingly complex level designs.

items.name: Canyon Defense
items.description: A tower defense game set in canyon landscapes where you strategically place defensive towers to repel waves of enemies attempting to traverse your territory.

items.name: Cell Machine
items.description: A puzzle game where you construct cellular machines using modular components, creating automated systems to process inputs and produce outputs through logical design.

items.name: Champion Archer
items.description: An archery competition game where you aim and fire arrows at targets with varying difficulty, managing wind resistance and distance for accurate shots.

items.name: Circlo
items.description: A circular puzzle game where you navigate geometric shapes through rotating rings and barriers, requiring timing and spatial awareness to progress through levels.

items.name: Connect 3
items.description: A match-three puzzle game where you connect colored tiles in groups of three or more, clearing pieces and cascading new ones in strategic tile manipulation gameplay.

items.name: Craftmine
items.description: A 2d version of minecraft, with a touch of terraria. Mine resources, craft items, and build structures in a pixelated sandbox world.

items.name: Creative Kill Chamber
items.description: A puzzle game emphasizing creative problem-solving where you eliminate targets using environmental hazards and physics to find unconventional kill methods.

items.name: CSGo Clicker
items.description: A Counter-Strike themed idle clicker where you earn in-game currency, purchase weapons and upgrades, and progress through weapon tiers and upgrades.

items.name: Cut the Rope - Holiday Gift
items.description: A holiday-themed sequel to Cut the Rope featuring festive levels and new mechanics, maintaining the physics-puzzle gameplay with seasonal challenges and obstacles.

items.name: Cut the Rope - Time Travel
items.description: A time-traveling puzzle adventure where you cut ropes to feed the monster across different eras, introducing time-manipulation mechanics alongside classic rope physics.

items.name: Cubefield
items.description: A 3D dodging game where you navigate a ship through an endless field of approaching cubes at high speed, requiring quick reflexes and spatial awareness.

items.name: Cupcake 2048
items.description: A themed variation of 2048 featuring cupcakes and desserts instead of numbers, combining sliding tile mechanics with a food-based aesthetic.

items.name: Deal or No Deal
items.description: A game show simulator based on the television series where you open cases and negotiate with a banker to secure the best possible deal or jackpot.

items.name: Death Run 3D
items.description: A 3d tunnel game where you must avoid constatnly changing barriers while moving with the music

items.name: Defend the Tank
items.description: A tower defense game where you protect a central tank from incoming waves of enemies, upgrading defenses and managing resources to survive increasingly difficult attacks.

items.name: Doge 2048
items.description: A 2048 variant featuring the popular Doge meme dog, sliding tiles and combining memes to reach the highest Doge tile through strategic number manipulation.

items.name: Double Wires
items.description: A precision platformer where you play like spiderman swinging through the world.

items.name: Draw the Hill
items.description: A creative physics game where you draw terrain and structures for a vehicle to navigate, testing your designs as the car drives across your creations.

items.name: Duck Life
items.description: The original duck training game where you develop a duckling through mini-games to prepare it for competitive racing, building speed and endurance attributes.

items.name: Duck Life 2
items.description: The sequel expands duck training with additional attributes and more diverse mini-games, offering deeper progression and more competitive racing challenges.

items.name: Duck Life 3
items.description: The third installment adds new environments and training types, featuring expanded gameplay with travel mechanics and more varied racing and competition scenarios.

items.name: Edge Not Found
items.description: A philosophical puzzle game exploring impossible geometry and spatial paradoxes, where you navigate environments that defy conventional logic and physics.

items.name: Elastic Man
items.description: A quirky physics-based game where you poke and manipulate a stretchy elastic character, watching it react and contort in exaggerated comedic ways.

items.name: Endless War 3
items.description: A strategic turn-based war game where you manage armies and territories, engaging in tactical combat across varied terrains while managing resources and troops.

items.name: Exo
items.description: A space game where you have crashed on an unknown planet and must survive from waves of alien invaders

items.name: Fake Virus
items.description: A humorous pranking interface that mimics a computer virus with fake warning messages and comedic alerts, designed to playfully startle users.

items.name: Flappy 2048
items.description: A hybrid game combining Flappy Bird mechanics with 2048 tile-matching, where you navigate through pipes while collecting and merging numbered tiles.

items.name: Flash Tetris
items.description: A classic Tetris implementation featuring falling tetromino blocks that you must arrange and clear, with traditional gravity and line-clearing mechanics.

items.name: Game Inside a Game
items.description: A meta-narrative puzzle game featuring games within games, with nested levels and reality-bending mechanics that challenge perceptions of game boundaries.

items.name: Glass City
items.description: It's open world game where you can explore, use different fire-arms, kill puppets, destroy environment, pick up items (puppets, grenades)  and just have fun.

items.name: Google Snake
items.description: Google's classic Snake game where a growing serpent eats pellets while avoiding walls and itself, with classic arcade gameplay mechanics.

items.name: Grindcraft
items.description: A Minecraft-inspired idle game where you gather resources, craft items, and progress through crafting recipes with an incremental mechanics layer.

items.name: Hacker Type
items.description: Pretend you are hacking by typing on your keyboard to make fake hacking show up.

items.name: Hover Bot Arena
items.description: A multiplayer robot combat game where hovering bots battle in arenas, using movement and firepower to eliminate opponents in fast-paced deathmatch scenarios.

items.name: Helicopter
items.description: A classic helicopter arcade game where you navigate a helicopter through narrow corridors, avoiding walls and obstacles at increasing speeds.

items.name: Hex Empire
items.description: A turn-based hexagonal strategy game where you build an empire, manage resources, and engage in tactical warfare across hexagonal grid territories.

items.name: HexGL
items.description: A 3D racing game through hexagonal tunnels at high speed, featuring neon aesthetics and futuristic track designs with responsive flight mechanics.

items.name: Idle Shark
items.description: An ocean-themed idle game where you control a shark collecting fish and upgrading abilities, managing a growing aquatic empire through progression.

items.name: Interactive Buddy
items.description: A digital pet simulator where you interact with an animated buddy character, clicking to poke, tickle, and perform actions triggering comedic reactions.

items.name: Just One Boss
items.description: A boss-focused action game featuring intense one-on-one battles against powerful opponents, emphasizing skill-based combat and pattern recognition.

items.name: Kitten Cannon
items.description: A physics-based distance game where you launch kittens from a cannon across landscapes, trying to achieve maximum distance with strategic power and angle adjustment.

items.name: Krunker.io
items.description: A fast-paced multiplayer first-person shooter with simple graphics and responsive controls, featuring various game modes and weapon classes for competitive play.

items.name: Learn to Fly
items.description: A penguin flight simulator where you launch yourself down icy slopes to achieve maximum distance, purchasing upgrades to increase speed and flight duration.

items.name: Matrix Rampage
items.description: An action game inspired by The Matrix featuring slow-motion combat, bullet-dodging mechanics, and martial arts-style melee combat against waves of enemies.

items.name: Meme 2048
items.description: A 2048 variant featuring internet memes instead of numbers, sliding and combining viral content to progress toward the highest meme tile.

items.name: Minecraft Classic
items.description: The original browser-based Minecraft in creative mode where you freely build and destroy blocks in an infinite world without survival mechanics.

items.name: Minesweeper
items.description: The classic puzzle game where you uncover hidden mines on a grid using numerical clues, requiring logic and deduction to identify safe tiles.

items.name: Mini Putt
items.description: A mini golf game featuring creative hole designs, power-ups, and obstacles, challenging you to sink putts with precise angle and power control.

items.name: Missiles
items.description: A quick paced tunel game where you must aim yourself correctly so you don't hit the wall

items.name: MotoX3M Pool
items.description: A water-themed stunt motorcycle game where you perform tricks and flips while riding on water and navigating pool-based obstacle courses with aquatic hazards.

items.name: MotoX3M Spooky
items.description: A Halloween-themed stunt motorcycle game featuring spooky environments, ghostly obstacles, and eerie atmospheres while maintaining the signature trick and flip mechanics.

items.name: MotoX3M Winter
items.description: A winter-themed motorcycle stunt game with snowy landscapes, icy surfaces, and cold-weather obstacles testing your balance and timing across frozen terrain.

items.name: NS Shaft
items.description: A vertical shaft descent game where you navigate downward through rotating obstacles and challenges, requiring precise timing to avoid hazards while descending.

items.name: Om Bounce
items.description: A rhythmic bouncing game where you tap to the beat, bouncing obstacles in sync with music to progress through levels with evolving soundtracks.

items.name: Pandemic 2
items.description: A strategy simulation where you create and spread a plague across the world, managing infection rates while avoiding detection and cure development.

items.name: Papa's Pizzaria
items.description: A time-management restaurant simulation where you take pizza orders, prepare pizzas with custom toppings, and serve customers while managing a growing business.

items.name: Paper.io 2
items.description: A territorial conquest game where you trace lines to claim map areas, competing against other players while protecting your border from being cut.

items.name: Papery Planes
items.description: A paper airplane flying game where you fold and customize planes, then guide them through obstacle courses and competitions with physics-based flight mechanics.

items.name: PolyBranch
items.description: A polygon-based puzzle platformer where geometric shapes navigate branching paths, requiring strategic routing through increasingly complex level designs.

items.name: Push the Square
items.description: A physics puzzle game where you push a square through obstacle courses using momentum and strategic pushing to reach the goal without losing control.

items.name: Push Your Luck
items.description: A gambling-style risk-reward game where you decide when to cash out or push for higher rewards, testing your courage and decision-making under pressure.

items.name: Rolly Vortex
items.description: A tunnel-rolling arcade game where a ball rolls through rotating vortex tunnels, requiring quick reflexes to avoid obstacles and maintain constant rolling momentum.

items.name: Sand Game
items.description: A particle sandbox simulation where you paint different materials like sand, water, and fire, observing realistic physics and chemical reactions between elements.

items.name: Super Mario 64
items.description: An emulated classic 3D platformer where Mario explores expansive castle worlds, collecting stars through diverse objectives, jumping puzzles, and creative level design.

items.name: Smoking Barrels
items.description: A western-themed top-down shooter where you eliminate waves of gunslinging enemies, managing limited ammunition while taking cover behind barrels and structures.

items.name: Snow Battle
items.description: A multiplayer snowball fight game where you throw snowballs at opponents in winter landscapes, combining physics-based projectiles with competitive arena combat.

items.name: Soldier Legend
items.description: A military action game where you command soldiers through combat scenarios, managing unit positioning and firepower to complete tactical objectives and missions.

items.name: Sort the Court
items.description: A roguelike card deck game where you make judicial decisions as a ruler, with each choice affecting your kingdom and determining your ultimate fate and ending.

items.name: Soundboard
items.description: A digital soundboard application featuring viral audio clips and meme sounds that you can trigger and layer for comedic effect and sound mixing.

items.name: Stack
items.description: A minimalist arcade game where you stack blocks on top of each other, trying to reach maximum height while avoiding tipping over or falling off.

items.name: Stack Bump 3D
items.description: A 3D block-stacking game where you build towers while bumping into obstacles, maintaining balance as structures grow taller with physics-based wobbling.

items.name: Stick War
items.description: A strategy action game featuring stick figure armies battling across terrain, building units and structures while commanding troops in real-time tactical combat.

items.name: Storm the House 2
items.description: A tower defense game where you defend a house from waves of attackers, purchasing weapons and upgrades to fortify your defenses and survive onslaught.

items.name: Superhot
items.description: A time-manipulation first-person shooter where time moves only when you move, allowing strategic planning and stylish combat scenarios against waves of enemies.

items.name: Swerve
items.description: A minimalist reflex game where you swerve a character to avoid incoming obstacles, testing reaction time with progressively increasing difficulty and speed.

items.name: Tactical Assassin
items.description: A sniper strategy game where you analyze scenes, identify targets, and execute eliminations with precision timing and careful tactical positioning.

items.name: Tank Trouble 2
items.description: A two-player tank battle game with maze arenas, ricocheting bullets, and power-ups, emphasizing strategic positioning and angle calculation for shots.

items.name: The Battle
items.description: A turn-based strategy game featuring opposing forces battling across terrain, where you deploy units and plan attacks to overcome enemy positions and armies.

items.name: The Heist
items.description: A planning and execution puzzle game where you orchestrate a heist, deciding routes and timing for completing the theft while avoiding guards and security.

items.name: This is the Only Level
items.description: A clever one-level platformer where game elements rearrange between attempts, using the same space in creative ways to create seemingly infinite challenges.

items.name: Toss the Turtle
items.description: A physics-based distance game where you launch a turtle across landscapes, purchasing upgrades and adjusting launch angles to achieve maximum flight distance.

items.name: Tube Jumpers
items.description: A cooperative platformer where characters jump through connected tubes and pipes, timing synchronized jumps to navigate obstacle-filled tunnel networks together.

items.name: TV Static
items.description: An experimental audiovisual experience simulating analog television static with interactive elements, creating a surreal and atmospheric multimedia installation.

items.name: Webretro
items.description: A retro game emulator allowing you to play classic arcade and console games through a browser interface with save functionality and controller support.

items.name: Wolfenstein 3D
items.description: A classic first-person shooter where you navigate castle levels eliminating enemies, collecting weapons and treasures while avoiding guard encounters.

items.name: Wordle
items.description: A word-guessing puzzle game where you deduce a hidden word through strategic guesses, receiving color-coded feedback on letter positions and correctness.

items.name: World's Hardest Game 2
items.description: The sequel to the punishing platformer, featuring even more brutal obstacle patterns, faster enemies, and tighter puzzle designs demanding extreme precision and patience.

items.name: Chat GPT
items.description: A web-based interface to interact with the Chat GPT language model, allowing users to input prompts and receive AI-generated text responses in real-time.

items.name: Duck Life: Treasure Hunt
items.description: An adventurous duck training game where you explore islands, find treasures, and train your duck with mini-games to enhance its abilities for competitive

items.name: Hexanaut
items.description: A multiplayer strategy game where you control hexagonal tiles to capture territory and outmaneuver opponents in real-time battles.

items.name: Defly.io
items.description: A multiplayer aerial combat game where you pilot a plane, capture zones, and engage in dogfights with other players in a dynamic arena.

items.name: ZombsRoyale.io
items.description: A 2D battle royale game where you scavenge for weapons, build structures, and fight to be the last player standing in a shrinking arena.

items.name: GooberDash
items.description: A fast-paced platformer with community made levels. Dash and jump across levels and become the last one standing.

items.name: Thomas 32x
items.description: The first full release of a 3D game made by the creator of this site. Control a bean and collect coffee mugs across 7 accessible areas!

items.name: RaycasterV4
items.description: Only really impressive if you reazlie this was made in scratch. Then it's amazing.

items.name: Super-Metroid
items.description: Super Metroid is one of the most influential games of all time, defining the Metroidvania genre. With great music and mechanics, and a vast planet to explore!

items.name: Metroid II
items.description: Metroid II: Return of Samus follows bounty hunter Samus Aran on the hostile planet SR388, tasked with exterminating the entire Metroid species

items.name: Metroid
items.description: Metroid is a classic 1986 action-adventure game where players control Samus Aran on planet Zebes, exploring interconnected areas, battling alien creatures, and acquiring power-ups to enhance abilities and access new regions, pioneering the 'Metroidvania' genre with its non-linear gameplay and atmospheric design.

items.name: CloudMoon
items.description: Play Clash Royale and other mobile games on this website

items.name: Kodub
items.description: A simple, fun game portal. Features Polytrack!
